item.title: Book I Have Read
item.description: Here is a list of books that I have read and liked. Books from Ted Chiang The Merchant and the Alchemist’s Exhalation The Lifecycle of Software Objects The Great Silence Anxiety is the Dizziness of Freedom Tower of Babylone Understand Division by Zero Story of Your Life Hell is the Absence of God I enjoy reading Ted Chiang a lot, maybe I get that from liking tech related stuff. Ted Chiang likes to take his inspiration from Scientific Topics, and most usually come from complex ones.
